pinyin: jing1 shen2 xing4 yan4 shi2 zheng4

sentences.english: STUDENT: They only studied diagnosed anorexics.
sentences.chinese: 他們只對被確診爲厭食症的人做了實驗。

sentences.english: Also, it should be pointed out that Olive Oyl was the first anorexic sex symbol.
sentences.chinese: 需要指出的是女主角奧利弗也許是第一個厭食症患者。

sentences.english: A variety of psychologic factors are associated with the development of behaviors characteristic of anorexia nervosa.
sentences.chinese: 很多病因素都與一些神經性厭食症特有的行爲有關。

sentences.english: We have a great list with thousands assortments of anorexia .
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個偉大的名單數千品種厭食症。

sentences.english: People who have anorexia or bulimia are at risk of bone loss.
sentences.chinese: 患有厭食症和食慾過盛的人處於骨質流失的風險中。

sentences.english: Anorexia nervosa also appears to be responsive to treatment with IPT.
sentences.chinese: 神經性厭食症，也似乎是順應間隙性治療。

sentences.english: Anorexia nervosa, a form of starvation, may affect adolescent girls.
sentences.chinese: 神經性厭食症是飢餓的一種形式，它對少女有影響。

sentences.english: She was battling anorexia and had medical issues.
sentences.chinese: 她正患有厭食症，內科也有問題。

sentences.english: Anorexia and bulimia become normal in a society that is striving to be slender.
sentences.chinese: 社會上，爲了變苗條厭食症和貪食症越來越普遍。

sentences.english: Each of whom had been diagnosed anorexic.
sentences.chinese: 她們每個人都有厭食症。

sentences.english: When a girl with anorexia looks in a mirror she sees herself as fat or obese.
sentences.chinese: 當一個有厭食症的女孩照鏡子時，她會覺得自己很胖。

sentences.english: NPU tablets are well suited for anorexia patients.
sentences.chinese: 網絡處理器片非常適合性厭食症患者。

sentences.english: Objective To further analyse personality features of children with anorexia nervosa.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲進一步瞭解神經性厭食症兒童的個性特點。

sentences.english: Anorexia is one of the psychosomatic disorders.
sentences.chinese: 神經性厭食症是一種心身障礙。

sentences.english: The mouth was more emphasized by women with anorexia or bulimia.
sentences.chinese: 有厭食症或暴食症的女性更傾向於描繪嘴部。

definition: yellow face, emaciated body (idiom); malnourished and sickly in appearance
to feel sick/to feel nauseous/to feel disgusted
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
see 無可救藥|无可救药[wu2 ke3 jiu4 yao4]
